message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product. I believe it holds significant value for your business, potentially even more than my asking price. To be fair, I'm offering it to you for $950,000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $820,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position, but $820,000 is significantly below my minimum. This product has the potential to generate substantial returns for you, far exceeding the difference in our valuations. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $885,000?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer $860,000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our respective valuations.
